plot: One of Vilgax's upgraded robot trackers bonds with a lady criminal, turning her into a cyborg to hunt down Ben.

A clash with a ruthless gang of lady criminals in New Mexico puts Grandpa Max in a hospital but it also turns the gang leader into a cyborg when one of Vilgax's damaged trackers merges with her. The resulting trouble from trackers honing in on the Omnitrix puts Ben in mind to distance himself from Max and Gwen for their safety, but it also puts Ben in contact with Vilgax for the first time.—statmanjeff
